## 107

```{r}
m <- 7
v <- 0.25

z <- (7.4 - m) / sqrt(v)
z
```

Tabelle:

```
P(x < 7.4) = 0.7881
P(x > 7.4) = 0.2119
```

P(x = 7.4) = 0 weil

- per unserer Definition P(x < a) = P(x <= a) = P(x < a) + P(x = a) und somit P(x = a) = 0
- integral von 7.4 bis 7.4 = 0

## 108

```{r}
m <- 498
s <- 6 # standardabweichung = sqrt varianz

z1 <- (505 - m) / s
z2 <- (495 - m) / s

z1
z2
```

P(495 < x < 505) = P(x < 505) - P(x < 495) = 0.8770 - 0.3085 = `r 0.8770 - 0.3085`
